title: Snakes, Electric Shocks and Afghanistan
teaser: A squeamish writer is sent on an assignment to locate enormous poisonous snakes; two child refugees from Afghanistan arrive in America without their parents;  a hippie kid seeks the approval of his conservative father. Hosted by The Mothâ€™s Artistic Director, Catherine Burns.
contentencoded:
Dan Kennedy travels to Indonesia to find giant snakes and live in the moment.
 
Dori Samadzai Bonner is smuggled out of Afghanistan with her little brother.
 
Tom Bodett fears his father's judgment after being accidentally electrocuted.
